{{velocity output="false"}} $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/suggest/suggestPicker.css', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/suggest/suggestPicker.js', true)## $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/userpicker/userPicker.css', true)## $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/phenotips/projectData.css', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/phenotips/projectData.js', true)## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.ImageDisplayer')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.ImageDisplayer')## {{/velocity}}{{velocity}} ## ## General project attributes ## #set ($project = $services.projects.getProjectById($doc)) #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit')## {{html}}{{/html}} (% class="xform" %)((( ; {{html}}{{/html}} : (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('phenotips.projectSheet.projectName.hint') : {{html}}{{/html}} ; {{html}}{{/html}} : (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('phenotips.groups.imageHint') : $doc.display('image') ; {{html}}{{/html}} : (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('phenotips.projectSheet.projectDescription.hint') : {{html wiki="false" clean="false"}}{{/html}} == $services.localization.render('phenotips.projectSheet.manageCollaborators') == ## ## Leaders section ## ; {{html}}{{/html}} : (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('phenotips.projectSheet.leadersHint') : {{html clean="false"}}
{{/html}} ## ## Contributors section ## ; {{html}}{{/html}} : (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('phenotips.projectSheet.contributorsHint') : $doc.display('openProjectForContribution') {{html}}{{/html}} : {{html clean="false"}}
{{/html}} ## ## Observers section ## ; {{html}}{{/html}} : (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('phenotips.projectSheet.observersHint') : {{html clean="false"}}
{{/html}} ## ## Templates section ## ; {{html}}{{/html}} : (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('phenotips.projectSheet.templatesHint') {{html clean="false"}}
{{/html}} ))) #else##not 'edit' mode (% class="group-logo" %)(((#if ($doc.getAttachmentList().size() > 0)$doc.display('image')#{else}$xwiki.getDocument('PhenoTips.ProjectTemplate').display('image')#{end}))) #set ($projectLeader = ($project.getCurrentUserAccessLevel().getName() == 'leader')) #set ($fullName = $project.getFullName()) #if ($doc.content != '') : $!escapetool.html($doc.content) #end ## ## Leaders section ## #if ($doc.openProjectForContribution != 'Yes') (% class="project-leaders-block" %) ; {{html}}{{/html}} : {{html clean="false"}}
{{/html}} ## ## Contributors section ## (% class="project-contributors-block" %) ; {{html}}{{/html}} #if ($doc.openProjectForContribution == 'Yes') : {{html}}{{/html}} #else : {{html clean="false"}}
{{/html}} #end #end ##end if not not open for contributions #end ##end if not 'edit' mode ## ## Patients (read only in edit or view mode) ## #set ($patientList = $project.getAllPatients()) #set ($currentUserAccessLevel = $project.getCurrentUserAccessLevel()) #if ($patientList && $patientList.size() > 0 && $xcontext.action == 'view' && $currentUserAccessLevel != 'collaborator') (% class="project-patients-block" id="project-patients-block"%) ; {{html}}{{/html}} : (% class="project-contributors" id="content-project-contributors" %)((({{include reference="PhenoTips.ProjectContributions"/}}))) #end {{/velocity}}

property.content: {{velocity}} $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/phenotips/projectData.css')## #if (($hasAdmin || $projectLeader) && $xcontext.action == 'view' && $hasEdit && $doc.getObject('PhenoTips.ProjectClass') && $doc.space == 'Projects') (% class="doc-tools buttonwrapper" %) ((([[ {{icon name="pencil"/}}>>path:$doc.getURL('edit') || title="$services.localization.render('phenotips.projectSheet.edit')" class="doc-tool edit button"]] [[ {{icon name="times"/}}>>path:$doc.getURL('delete') || title="$services.localization.render('phenotips.projectSheet.delete')" class="doc-tool delete button"]]))) #end {{/velocity}}
